comments.body: I linked to the mesos-dns naming docs above. should I include another link here?
Why not an example with a pod? RCs are more complicated.

it's generally a more useful feature for RC templates since those have auto-generated names that yield unpredictable task name's --> unpredictable mesos-dns record names. i don't think it's asking too much of our users to understand that they can apply the same technique to pods. anyone who's doing something other than toying around in kubernetes isn't using raw pods to deploy stuff - they're using RCs.
